content: List of my services:✅ Automation of any repetitive task. Including but not limited to: Scraping, captcha solving, Social media automation(topic or location specific follow/like bots for twitter or insta. Can use any open source project but comes with highrisk or build from scratch with near to no risk of detection). As long as your task is not illegal and illicit, I will do it.✅ Trading bot based on your method (NFA DYOR, I will only automate your strategy if there's a pattern - Probabilistic or Deterministic)✅ Bot creation. AI Chatbots, Voice call bots(Twilio will be used), Platform-specific bots(like Discord, telegram, twitch etc)✅ Building backend of your webApp on JS or LAMP stack(your choice). Can do basic frontend, but I would suggest hiring a dedicated professional for a more suitable result.Portfolio can be provided on request.Send me a message.
